message.content:
We must calculate the “Interest Receivables” balance at the period end. In our problem the only “Interest Receivables” entries are those transactions whose type is “Interest Receivables”. (Note that there are no “Interest” items in the initial opening entries so the beginning interest receivable balance is zero.) 

Step‐by‐step:

1. Identify the interest receivable transactions and record their amounts:
  • Interest20240101001 = 373.80  
  • Interest20240102002 = 106.80  
  • Interest20240103003 = 106.80  
  • Interest20240104004 = 95.23  
  • Interest20240105005 = 95.23  
  • Interest20240106006 = 95.23  
  • Interest20240107007 = 95.23  
  • Interest20240108008 = 61.41  
  • Interest20240109009 = 61.41  
  • Interest20240110010 = –18.69  
  • Interest20240111011 = –54.29  
  • Interest20240112012 = –27.59  
  • Interest20240113013 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240114014 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240115015 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240116016 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240117017 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240118018 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240119019 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240120020 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240121021 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240122022 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240123023 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240124024 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240125025 = 16.91  
  • Interest20240126026 = 0.87964307  
  • Interest20240127027 = 2.65964307  
  • Interest20240128028 = 11.55964307  
  • Interest20240129029 = 0.21422211  

2. Sum the first nine entries:
  373.80 + 106.80 + 106.80 + 95.23 + 95.23 + 95.23 + 95.23 + 61.41 + 61.41 = 1091.14

3. Then add the three negative values:
  1091.14 – 18.69 = 1072.45  
  1072.45 – 54.29 = 1018.16  
  1018.16 – 27.59 = 990.57

4. Next, add the 13 successive “16.91” entries (from Interest20240113013 through Interest20240125025):
  13 × 16.91 = 219.83  
  990.57 + 219.83 = 1210.40

5. Finally add the four remaining interest amounts:
  1210.40 + 0.87964307 = 1211.28 (approximately)  
  1211.28 + 2.65964307 = 1213.94  
  1213.94 + 11.55964307 = 1225.50  
  1225.50 + 0.21422211 = 1225.71  

Thus the total “Interest Receivables” added during the period is about 1225.71. Since no opening (initial) interest receivable is provided, the balance sheet starts at 0.00.

Therefore, the final answer is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Interest Receivable Initial Value": "0.00",
    "Interest Receivable End Value": "1225.71"
  }
}
